page.title: 03MELBOURNE HALL
page.content: MELBOURNE HALL IS A STATELY HOME THAT IS A MAJOR TOURIST ATTRACTION.IT IS A FAMILY HOME THAT HAS BEEN PASSED DOWN BY DESCENT AND NEVER BY PURCHASE SINCE IT WAS BROUGHT INTO THE FAMILY BY SIR JOHN COKE IN THE 17TH CENTURY.THE PRESENT OWNER IS LORD LOTHIAN.THE IMPRESSIVE EAST FACADE AND FORMAL GARDENS WERE DESIGNED IN THE 18TH CENTURY.THE FOCAL POINT OF THE GARDENS IS THE BIRDCAGE,AN EXQUISITE WROUGHT_ IRON ARBOUR BUILT BY ROBERT BAKEWELL. THE YEW TUNNEL,200 YARDS LONG,IS REPUTED TO BE THE LONGEST IN EUROPE. THE SOUTH FRONT OVERLOOKS THE POOL, WHICH IS ARTIFICIAL.THE MUNIMENT ROOM CONTAINS MANY OF THE FAMILY ESTATE PAPERS.A CRAFT CENTRE IS HOUSED IN THE OUTBUILDINGS,BRINGING NEW LIFE TO REDUNDANT BUILDINGS.ESTATE BUILDINGS IN THE CHURCH YARD INCLUDE A MEDIEVAL TITHE BARN AND THE STONE COTTAGE.
